definitions.text: the act of mixing cards haphazardly
walking with a slow dragging motion without lifting your feet
examples: from his shambling I assumed he was very old
he shuffled out of the room
We heard his feet shuffling down the hall

definitions.text: move about, move back and forth
examples: He shuffled his funds among different accounts in various countries so as to avoid the IRS

definitions.text: mix so as to make a random order or arrangement
